A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was a bit of a disappointment. There was a lot of comedy aimed at an audience too young to be watching a movie like this. It felt almost like an after school kids comedy at times like Saved By The Bell. The plot wasn't great. It seemed as though the writers and directors found the pre-existing plot of Star Wars an inconvenience they needed to find ways to work around. On a positive note the actors gave a great performance.
